shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.437*time) + 0.40*sin(0.970*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.344*time) + 0.40*sin(0.841*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.251*time) + 0.40*sin(1.055*time) );
per_frame_4=//wave_b = wave_b * wave_g;
per_frame_5=//wave_r = wave_r * sqrt(wave_b);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=//wave_mystery = time*0.3;
per_frame_8=rot = rot + 0.01*( 0.60*sin(0.181*time) + 0.09*sin(-0.279*time) );
per_frame_9=zoom = zoom + 0.01*( 0.60*sin(0.3131*time+2) + 0.4*sin(-0.479*time+4) );
per_frame_10=//cx = cx + 0.10*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.10*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_11=//cy = cy + 0.10*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.10*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_12=//dx = dx + 0.00740*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_13=//dy = dy + 0.00740*( 0.60*sin(0.284*time) + 0.40*sin(0.247*time) );
per_frame_14=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%6,0);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=//wave_x = 0.1 + rand(80)*0.01;
per_frame_17=//wave_y = 0.1 + rand(80)*0.01;
per_frame_18=t2 = time*6;
per_frame_19=wave_x = 0.5 + 0.3*( 0.60*sin(0.374*t2) + 0.40*sin(0.294*t2) );
per_frame_20=wave_y = 0.5 + 0.3*( 0.60*sin(0.393*t2) + 0.40*sin(0.223*t2) );
per_pixel_1=//dx = 0;
per_pixel_2=//dy = 0;
per_pixel_3=dx = dx + cos(y*29.37 - time*1.9) * 1.0/pixelsx * 2;
per_pixel_4=dy = dy + cos(x*33.21 - time*1.7) * 1.0/pixelsy * 2;
per_pixel_5=dx = dx + cos(y*77.55 - time*2.1) * 1.0/pixelsx * 1.5;
per_pixel_6=dy = dy + cos(x*78.32 - time*2.4) * 1.0/pixelsy * 1.5;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float2 d = 0.02*aspect.zw;
warp_5=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv+float2(1,0)*d-floor(uv+float2(1,0)*d))-GetBlur2(uv-float2(1,0)*d-floor(uv-float2(1,0)*d)) );
warp_6=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv+float2(0,1)*d-floor(uv+float2(0,1)*d))-GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,1)*d-floor(uv-float2(0,1)*d)) );
warp_7=`    float3 b1 = GetBlur1(uv) - 0;
warp_8=`    d = 0.01;
warp_9=`    float d2 = -0.02;
warp_10=`    float1 thr = 0;
warp_11=`    float1 c = 0.005;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*d - float2(dy.x,-dx.x)*d2;
warp_15=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_16=`    ret.y += (ret.y - b1.y - thr)*.02 +c;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*d - float2(dy.z,-dx.z)*d2;
warp_20=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).x;
warp_21=`    ret.x += (ret.x - b1.x - thr)*.02 +c;
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*d - float2(dy.y,-dx.y)*d2;
warp_25=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).z;
warp_26=`    ret.z += (ret.z - b1.z - thr)*.02 +c;
warp_27=`
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_4=`//ret=lum(ret)>0+(lum(ret)<=0.75)*ret;
comp_5=`ret-=roam_sin.zyx*roam_cos.ywx;
comp_6=`ret=pow(GetBlur1(uv).xyz/treb_att,1-lum(saturate(ret.xyz)));
comp_7=`ret=pow(GetBlur2(uv).xyz/bass_att,1-lum(saturate(ret.xyz)));
comp_8=`//ret=1-ret;
comp_9=`}
